title: Florian Metwaly
text:
Hi!
I am a a research masterâ€™s student at Utrecht University in Methodology and Statistics for the Behavioral, Biomedical and Social Sciences, with a keen interest in causal inference, Bayesian statistics, and computational methods. My current work focuses on developing and applying innovative methodologies for Target Trial Emulation and Bayesian Evidence Synthesis. I am passionate about bridging theoretical advancements with real-world applications, particularly in healthcare and social sciences.
